if.test: startTime!=null and startTime !=''and endTime != null and endTime !=''

sql.if:
union select distinct a1."id",a1."report_type_id" "reportTypeId",a2."type_name" "reportTypeName","icon" from "mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_datapermission" a4 ON a1."id" = a4."type_id" left join ( SELECT a."type_id",a."group_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_mapper" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_datapermission" b ON a."type_id" = b."type_id" WHERE b."type" = 'REPORT' and b."is_group" = 1) t2 ON a1."id" = t2."type_id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and a4."is_group"=1 and "group_id" IN
#{item.value,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select "type_name" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" where "id" = #{report_type_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select "time_tag" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" where "id" = #{report_time_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select "action_name" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_action_mapper" b on a."id"=b."report_id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_tag_action_table" c on b."action_id"=c."id" where a."id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c."id" from "mw_report_table" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_action_mapper" b on a."id"=b."report_id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_tag_action_table" c on b."action_id"=c."id" where a."id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c."rule_name" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_rule_mapper" b on a."id"=b."report_id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_alert_rule" c on b."rule_id"=c."rule_id" where a."id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c."rule_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_rule_mapper" b on a."id"=b."report_id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_alert_rule" c on b."rule_id"=c."rule_id" where a."id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t1."user_id" "userId", t1."login_name" "loginName", t1."user_name" "userName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" t2 on t1."user_id" = t2."user_id" where t2."type"='REPORT' and t2."type_id" = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1."org_id" "orgId", t1."org_name" "orgName", t1."nodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t2 on t1."org_id" = t2."org_id" where t2."type"='REPORT' and t2."type_id" = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1."group_id" "groupId", t1."group_name" "groupName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_table" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_mapper" t2 on t1."group_id" = t2."group_id" where t2."type"='REPORT' and t2."type_id" = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select "id", "start_hour_time" as "startHourTime", "end_hour_time" as "endHourTime", "start_minute_time" as "startMinuteTime", "end_minute_time" as "endMinuteTime" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_solar_time" where "delete_flag"=0 and type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by "modification_date" desc rownum = 1;
mapper.insert:
select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_SOLAR_TIME.NEXTVAL as "id" from DUAL
insert into ${TBSNAME}."mw_solar_time"("id","user_id","creator","create_date","modifier","modification_date","start_hour_time","end_hour_time","start_minute_time","end_minute_time","type") values (#{id},#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{startHourTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endHourTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startMinuteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endMinuteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select "id","type_name" as "typeName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table"
select "id" as "dropKey","time_tag" as "dropValue" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table"
select "id","action_name" as "actionName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_tag_action_table"

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" a3 on a1."report_time_id"=a3."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_datapermission" a4 ON a1."id" = a4."type_id" left join (select "type_id","user_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" where "type"='REPORT') a5 ON a1."id" = a5."type_id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and a4."is_user" = 1 and "user_id" =#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" a3 on a1."report_time_id"=a3."id"
left join (select "type_id","org_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" where "type"='REPORT') t2 ON a1."id" = t2."type_id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and "org_id" in
#{item.value,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where a1."delete_flag" = 0

select a1."id",a1."report_type_id" as "reportTypeId",a2."type_name" as "reportTypeName","icon" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_datapermission" a4 ON a1."id" = a4."type_id" left join (select "type_id","user_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" where "type"='REPORT') a5 ON a1."id" = a5."type_id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and a4."is_user" = 1 and "user_id" =#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a1."id", a1."report_type_id" "reportTypeId",a2."type_name" "reportTypeName","icon" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id"
left join (select "type_id","org_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" where "type"='REPORT') t2 ON a1."id" = t2."type_id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and "org_id" in
#{item.value,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where a1."delete_flag" = 0

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" a3 on a1."report_time_id"=a3."id" where a1."id"=#{assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select "interface_id" "interfaceID","caption","in_bandwidth","out_bandwidth","band_unit", MAX("in_max_bps") "inMaxbps", MIN("in_min_bps") "inMinbps", round(AVG("in_average_bps"),2) "inAveragebps", MAX("in_max_use") "inMaxUse", round(AVG("in_avg_use"),2) "inAvgUse",
round(AVG("in_proportion_ten"),2) "inProportionTen", round(AVG("in_proportion_fifty"),2) "inProportionFifty", round(AVG("in_proportion_eighty"),2) "inProportionEighty", round(AVG("in_proportion_hundred"),2) "inProportionHundred",
MAX("out_max_bps") "outMaxbps", MIN("out_min_bps") "outMinbps", round(AVG("out_average_bps"),2) "outAveragebps", MAX("out_max_use") "outMaxUse", round(AVG("out_avg_use"),2) "outAvgUse",
round(AVG("out_proportion_ten"),2) "outProportionTen", round(AVG("out_proportion_fifty"),2) "outProportionFifty", round(AVG("out_proportion_eighty"),2) "outProportionEighty", round(AVG("out_proportion_hundred"),2) "outProportionHundred"
from ${TBSNAME}."${tableName}" where "interface_id" in
#{item}
group by "interface_id","caption","in_bandwidth","out_bandwidth","band_unit"
select count(0) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_solar_day_detail_allday" where "date_time" between #{allDayStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{allDayStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(0) from ${TBSNAME}."${tableName}" where "date_time" between #{allDayStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{allDayStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(0) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_solar_day" where "date"=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" a3 on a1."report_time_id"=a3."id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and a1."report_time_id" = 1
select "report_id" "reportId", "rule_id" "ruleId", "rule_type" "ruleType" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_rule_mapper" where "report_id" = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select "user_id" as "userId", "user_name" as "userName", "login_name" as "loginName", "email" as "email" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" where "user_id" in
#{item}

select "date_time" as "date","${inColumn}" as "value" from ${TBSNAME}."${tableName}" where "interface_id"=#{interfaceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and "date_time" between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by date asc

select "date_time" as "date","${outColumn}" as "value" from ${TBSNAME}."${tableName}" where "interface_id"=#{interfaceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and "date_time" between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by date asc

SELECT t1."id", t1."assets_id", t1."assets_name", t1."in_band_ip", t1."assets_type_id", t1."create_date", t1."monitor_server_id", t2."type_name" FROM ( SELECT "id", "assets_id", "assets_name", "in_band_ip", "assets_type_id", "create_date", "monitor_server_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_tangibleassets_table" WHERE "delete_flag" = 0 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_assetssubtype_table" t2 ON t1."assets_type_id" = t2."id"
and #{dateStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >t1."create_date"
and #{dateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >=t1."create_date"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_run_time_status"("id","host_id", "asset_name", "ip", "item_name", "max_value", "min_value", "avg_value", "out_interface_avg_value", "sort_last_avg_value","date_type","interface_name","disk_name","assetsId","belong_time") select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_REPORT_RUN_TIME_STATUS.NEXTVAL as id,t.* from
( #{item.hostId} as "host_id", #{item.assetName} as "asset_name", #{item.ip} as "ip", #{item.itemName} as "item_name", #{item.maxValue} as "max_value", #{item.minValue} as "min_value", #{item.avgValue} as "avg_value", #{item.outInterfaceAvgValue} as "out_interface_avg_value", #{item.sortLastAvgValue} as "sort_last_avg_value", #{param} as "date_type", #{item.interfaceName} as "interface_name", #{item.diskName} as "disk_name", #{item.assetsId} as "assetsId", #{date} as "belong_time" )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_run_time_status" where "item_name" = #{name} and "date_type" =#{type}
SELECT * FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_run_time_status" where "item_name" = #{name} and "belong_time" BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and "assetsId" is not null

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_type_table" a2 on a1."report_type_id"=a2."id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_time_task_table" a3 on a1."report_time_id"=a3."id" where a1."delete_flag" = 0 and a1."send_time" = true and a1."id" = #{reportId}

select "is_ssl" as "isSsl", "email_server_address" as "hostName", "email_server_port" as "port", "email_send_username" as "username", "email_send_password" as "password", "personal" as "personal" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_alert_email_rule" where rule_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select "report_id" "reportId", "user_id" "userId", "group_id" "groupId", "type" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_senduser" where "report_id" = #{reportId}

select "user_id" "userId","user_name" "userName","login_name" "loginName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" where "delete_flag" = 0 and "user_id" in
#{item}

select "group_id" "groupId","group_name" "groupName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_table" where "delete_flag" = 0 and "group_id" in
#{item}

SELECT t1."type_id" "typeId", t2."drop_value" "valueName" FROM ( SELECT "type_id", "drop_tagboard" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_label_drop_mapper" WHERE "label_id" = ( SELECT "label_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_labelmanage_table" WHERE "label_name" = '月度报表' ) ) t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_dropdown_table" t2 on t1.drop_tagboard = t2."drop_id"

SELECT DISTINCT "user_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_group_mapper" WHERE "group_id" IN ( SELECT DISTINCT "group_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_senduser" WHERE "type" = 'GROUP' and "report_id" = #{reportId})

SELECT DISTINCT t3."assets_id" "assetsId", t2."drop_value" "dropValue", t3."assets_name" "assetsName", t3."in_band_ip" "assetsIp", t3."monitor_server_id" "serverId", t3."in_band_ip" ip FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_label_drop_mapper" t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_dropdown_table" t2 ON t1."drop_tagboard" = t2."drop_id" LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_tangibleassets_table" t3 ON t1."type_id" = t3."id" WHERE t1."module_type" = 'ASSETS' AND t3."delete_flag" = 0 AND "label_id" = ( SELECT "label_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_labelmanage_table" WHERE "input_format" = 3 AND "label_name" = #{labelName} AND "delete_flag" = 0 )

select "interface_id" "interfaceID","caption","in_bandwidth","out_bandwidth","band_unit", "in_max_bps" "inMaxbps", "in_min_bps" "inMinbps", "in_average_bps" "inAveragebps", "in_max_use" "inMaxUse", "in_avg_use" "inAvgUse", "in_proportion_ten" "inProportionTen", "in_proportion_fifty" "inProportionFifty", "in_proportion_eighty" "inProportionEighty", "in_proportion_hundred" "inProportionHundred", "out_max_bps" "outMaxbps", "out_min_bps" "outMinbps", "out_average_bps" "outAveragebps", "out_max_use" "outMaxUse", "out_avg_use" "outAvgUse", "out_proportion_ten" "outProportionTen", "out_proportion_fifty" "outProportionFifty", "out_proportion_eighty" outProportionEighty, "out_proportion_hundred" "outProportionHundred" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_link_allday"
select "id", "item_name" as "itemName", "chn_name" as "chnName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_index_table"

select "id" as "id", "assets_name" as "assetsName", "assets_ip" as "assetIp", "assets_id" as "assetsId", "server_id" as "serverId", "host_id" as "hostId", "last_value" as "lastValue", "units" as "units", "item_name" as "itemName", "partition_name" as "partitionName", "clock" as "clock", "date" as "date", "save_time" as "saveTime" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_cache_latest_table" where 1 = 1
and "assets_id" in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and
"item_name" like CONCAT('%',#{name})

select "id" as "id", "assets_name" as "assetsName", "assets_ip" as "assetIp", "assets_id" as "assetsId", "server_id" as "serverId", "host_id" as "hostId", "value_avg" as "avgValue", "value_max" as "maxValue", "value_min" as "minValue", "units" as "units", "item_name" as "itemName", "partition_name" as "partitionName", "clock" as "clock", "date" as "date", "save_time" as "saveTime" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_cache_history_table" where 1 = 1 and #{startTime} <= "clock" and #{endTime} >= "clock"
and "assets_id" in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and
"item_name" like CONCAT('%',#{name})
